quests.name: The Spark of Imagination
objectives: Search for something to repair the bridge lever.
Fix the lever to reach the next platform.
The bridge should rotate... Come up with a solution using everything you can find.
Activate the wheel to turn the bridge.
Follow Oswald to the next platform.
Use everything you've learned to fix the platform and reach the Spark of Imagination.
Pick up the Spark of Imagination!
